script-file.#desc: If present, execute the script in script-file and exit.

args.#desc: Additional arguments to the script specified by script-file.

--no-rc.#desc: Do not load any xonsh RC files.

--no-script-cache.#desc: Do not cache scripts as they are run.

--cache-everything.#desc: Use a cache, even for interactive commands.

--timings.#desc: Prints timing information before the prompt is shown.
